title: Flailing
description:
Kelly Carlin, Mandy Dagley and Adam Selbst share stories about celebrity kids, urinary revenge, and puppet bus fiascos.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Claptone, Chris Prythm, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison, Adam Selbst, Peter, Leif Garrett, Bjorn and John, Ginger Root, Amanda Dagley, Kelly Carlin)
